Package cm2100.diary

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • cm2100.diary.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Date>
    public class Date
extends Object
implements Comparable<Date>
    A simple class modelling a date with a year, month and day.
    Author:
    K. Hui

        month - The calendar month. e.g. 1 for Jan, 2 for Feb, etc.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object other)
        Compare if the Date equals to another Date based on their year, month, and day.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        other - The other Date to compare with.
        Returns:
        true if the 2 Date objects present the same calendar date, false otherwise.

      • daysInMonth

        public static int daysInMonth​(int year,
                              int month)
        This method returns the number of days in a month, taking into consideration of leap year.
        Parameters:
        year - The year.
        month - The month in question.
        Returns:
        The number of days in this month and year.

      • dayInWeek

        public static int dayInWeek​(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day)
        Find out a weekday based on the year, month, and day.
        Parameters:
        year - The year. e.g. 2019.
        month - The calendar month. e.g. 1 for Jan, 2 for Feb, etc.
        day - The day in a month.
        Returns:
        The return value is in the range 0-6, meaning Sunday, Monday, ..., Saturday.
